title: Academic convicted of Paris synagogue bombing in 1980
description: An academic has been found guilty of a bombing outside a Paris synagogue in 1980 which claimed the lives of four people and left 46 wounded.

title: Ukraine will struggle to win the war and Russia will struggle to lose, increasing pressure for negotiations
description: The West has committed to support Ukraine's battle against the Russian invasion, but what can Ukraine realistically expect to achieve with its forthcoming offensive?

title: Muslims around the world celebrate Eid al Fitr after month of fasting for Ramadan
description: Muslims around the world are celebrating the holiday of Eid al Fitr.

title: Ten members of same family shot dead 'while they were sleeping'
description: Gunmen stormed a house in South Africa and killed 10 members of the same family - seven of them women - police have said.

title: 'They didn't even let me say goodbye - it's been almost a year since I saw my mum'
description: Apart from the odd roadblock and uniformed men carrying weapons and checking your car, in certain parts of Ukraine, it's very easy to forget there's a war going on.

title: NATO allies 'agree Ukraine will become member'
description: All NATO allies have agreed that Ukraine will become a member, says secretary general Jens Stoltenberg.

title: Sudanese paramilitary group agrees to 72-hour ceasefire - as US confirms one of its citizens has died
description: The paramilitary group fighting the army in Sudan has agreed to a "complete ceasefire" for 72 hours - as the US confirmed one of its citizens has died in the six-day conflict.

title: Russian warplane bombs one of its own cities
description: Russia has admitted accidentally striking one of its own cities near Ukraine after a large explosion left two women injured and damaged buildings.
